metadata.title: CVE-2015-7713 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenStack Compute (Nova) before 2014.2.4 (juno) and 2015.1.x before2015.1.2 (kilo) do not properly apply security group changes, which allowsremote attackers to bypass intended restriction by leveraging an instancethat was running when the change was made.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7713` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 1:2014.1.5-0ubuntu1.7
